Newby question:

I've installed Heritrix 2.0 on Windows Server R2. It seems=
 to be running, but I can't access the browser-based admin interface. I get=
 a 503 error when I connect to localhost:8080. I tried specifying a differe=
nt port, but got the same error.

Is anybody running 2.0 on Windows?

thank=
s.
Willis Johnson
Santa Monica, CA
